title: been getting really unlucky with recent games. had to unload somewhere.
body:
I was feeling good for a while, got a big string of wins and hopped up a few divisions. the last few days it seems I'm getting at least one troll or feeder and in several I was the sole being keeping my team alive as long as I could. I always thought winning and pushing up my mmr (though it's already higher than my tier since I spar with mid gold in normals and got dropped into bronze 5 as soon as my 10 games were up) would pit me against better people, not better enemies and shittier allies.
side note do allies affect my MMR? I hope to god not because I've been getting less lp per win since this loss streak, went from 25 on average to 15.

now I'm not saying I wasn't a factor in losing sometimes nor am I asking for a ticket up to challenjour by way of fedora, I truly feel I've been in a string of bad luck despite my best efforts.

replies.body: The lp difference is probably just because of your division being higher up on the ladder, but at least you were on a win streak! I haven't had very good luck with regards to my team.
